Question
========
Evaluate the following two statements about factor analysis:

I. To interpret a factor, assess items with an Eigenvalue greater than 1. II. The higher the communality of an item, the less variance in the item is explained by the factor solution.


  
Answerlist
----------
* I is correct, II is correct
* I is true, II is false
* I is not correct, II is correct
* I is not right, II is not right
